Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the refresh schedule.

RefreshType.description:
The type of refresh that a dataset undergoes. Valid values are as follows:

- `FULL_REFRESH` : A complete refresh of a dataset.
- `INCREMENTAL_REFRESH` : A partial refresh of some rows of a dataset, based on the time window specified.

For more information on full and incremental refreshes, see [Refreshing SPICE data](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/quicksight/latest/user/refreshing-imported-data.html) in the *Amazon QuickSight User Guide* .

ScheduleFrequency.description: The frequency for the refresh schedule.

ScheduleId.description: An identifier for the refresh schedule.

StartAfterDateTime.description: Time after which the refresh schedule can be started, expressed in `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS` format.

RefreshScheduleMap.description: A summary of a configured refresh schedule for a dataset.

description: Creates a refresh schedule for a dataset in Amazon QuickSight .

AwsAccountId.description: The AWS account ID of the account that you are creating a schedule in.

DataSetId.description: The ID of the dataset that you are creating a refresh schedule for.

Schedule.description: The refresh schedule of a dataset.
